title: Resolve Gift Subscription Activation Issue
description: A user received a gift subscription to a streaming service but is having trouble activating it.

tasks.description: Ask the user for the gift subscription code.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the code from the user.

tasks.description: Check the status of the gift code in the subscription system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the code is valid but has not yet been redeemed.

tasks.description: Guide the user through the redemption process on the website.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides step-by-step instructions to the user.

tasks.description: Manually apply the gift code to the user's account if they are still unable to redeem it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the subscription credit to the user's account.
